    • 方法详细资料

      • set

        java.lang.String set(java.lang.String key,
                   java.lang.String value,
                   java.lang.String nxxx,
                   java.lang.String expx,
                   long time)
        Set the string value as value of the key. The string can't be longer than 1073741824 bytes (1 GB).
        参数:
        key -
        value -
        nxxx - NX|XX, NX -- Only set the key if it does not already exist. XX -- Only set the key if it already exist.
        expx - EX|PX, expire time units: EX = seconds; PX = milliseconds
        time - expire time in the units of
        返回:
        Status code reply
